alert.note: Alert for Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:47PM CDT until July 26 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN STEARNS AND NORTHERN KANDIYOHI COUNTIES... At 1046 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Brooten, or 18 miles northwest of Willmar, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported branches down and power outages earlier with this storm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New London and Spicer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
